document.full_text: britain's martin laird regained his composure after making successive bogeys to head into sunday's final round of the arnold palmer invitational with a two shot lead.
document.title: britain's laird stays on top at arnold palmer
lines_and_colors: britain's martin laird regained his composure after making successive bogeys to head into sunday's final round of the arnold palmer invitational with a two shot lead.
